title: Ticket #2393: Job attribute "Arguments" appears as "Args" for Negotiator
description:
Job classad attribute "Arguments" is seen as such by the Startd. The Negotiator however receives this attribute under the title "Args".

Therefore, if policy decisions should be made on the Startd side based on "Arguments" the same expression also needs to be added for "Args" such that the Negotiator is able to handle it correctly.

Example:

Jobs with argument "force" should run immediately and preempt other jobs. This could lead to a RANK expression in the Startd of 

RANK = (Arguments =?= "force")

However, this RANK will never be honored by the Negotiator as "Arguments" is undefined there. A workaround would be 

RANK =  ( (Arguments =?= "force") || (Args =?= "force") )

To me this seems like either a consistency that should be documented or a bug.
